mapper.select: select no, name, ceo, corporation_no as corporationNo, address, phone, conditions, item, open_date as openDate, jurisdiction_office as jurisdictionOffice, manager_name as managerName, manager_email as managerEmail, deposit_no as depositNo, insert_userid as insertUserid, insert_day as insertDay, update_userid as updateUserid, update_day as updateDay, delete_flag as deleteFlag from tb_purchasecustomer;
mapper.insert: insert into tb_purchasecustomer values (#{no}, #{name}, #{ceo}, #{corporationNo}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{phone}, #{conditions}, #{item}, #{openDate}, #{jurisdictionOffice}, #{managerName}, #{managerEmail}, #{depositNo}, #{depositHost}, #{insertUserid}, now(), null, null, 'N')
